CIAttributeDescription: Blurs an image to simulate the effect of using a camera that moves a specified angle and distance while capturing the image.

inputAngle.CIAttributeDescription: The angle of the motion determines which direction the blur smears.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputRadius.CIAttributeDescription: The radius determines how many pixels are used to create the blur. The larger the radius, the blurrier the result.
